# Crypto

> Standard library cryptography.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var cryptography = require( '@stdlib/crypto' );
```

#### cryptography

Standard library cryptography.

```javascript
var c = cryptography;
// returns {...}
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->
